mapper.insert: INSERT INTO class_info(name, begin, end, code, course) VALUES (#{name}, #{begin}, #{end}, #{code}, #{course})
mapper.select: SELECT u.username AS username, k.name AS name, u.avatar AS avatar, k.sid AS sid FROM sys_user as u, kyc_info as k, user_kyc WHERE k.id = user_kyc.kid AND u.id = user_kyc.uid AND user_kyc.uid IN (SELECT uid from selection_info WHERE cid = #{id})
